about_lead: German language meet-up for refugees - Every tuesday from 18:00 to 20:00 in the Tommasini in Lenzburg
location_bus_stop: Get off at the "Bachstrasse" bus stop
location_note_discount: We can pay 50% of ticket costs for participants.
location_text:
We're in the "Tommasini" in lenzburg. The Tommasini can be reached easily on foot, by bicycle or public transport.
Parking spaces for cars and bicycles are available for free.
Coming from the lenzburg train station, the Tommasini can be reached in about 15 minutes. The bus line 391, coming from lenzburg train station, also stops nearby.
participant_info_text:
We're happy, that you found us! "Vo Ergendwo" offers a relaxed atmosphere, where fun and games are just as important as learning german or doing homework. 
Apart from helping you learn german, we can help you apply for jobs, understand official letters, and help you with other challenges. Our meet-up is free for all participants. If you're interested, just come by!
contact_form_desc: You can send us a message using this form. Leave your e-mail address or phone number, and we'll get back to you.
contact_form_success: Your message was sent! We'll get in touch via e-mail or phone!
helper_only_german: This section is addressed to people interested in helping us conduct the language meet-up, and other activities. Therefore, it is only available in german.
